data.title: Blue Kite Cinema
data.meta_description: Blue Kite Cinema | 8 followers on LinkedIn. Film/TV Production Company | Blue Kite Cinema is a Film/TV production company based in LA and since starting BKC in 2012, they have created award-winning works in various industries. They've produced the #1 commercial spot on national TV for CIZE, written and directed short films, commercials and crafted award-winning wedding films that have been seen worldwide. Their most recent project was 2 seasons of the Telly Award-winning TV show, Our Wedding Story on UPtv.
